alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued December 31 at 12:52PM MST until January 03 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM MST /6 PM PST/ THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...An extended period of stagnant air, with light winds and little vertical mixing. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...From 7 PM MST /6 PM PST/ this evening to 8 AM MST /7 AM PST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: An Air Stagnation Advisory concerns itself with meteorological conditions only. For more information on air pollution in Idaho, visit website www.deq.idaho.gov. For Oregon, visit website www.oregon.gov/deq. If possible, reduce or eliminate activities that contribute to air pollution, such as outdoor burning, and the use of residential wood burning devices. Reduce vehicle trips and vehicle idling as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River
